text: Violet E. Powell was a British screenwriter active during the 1920s and 1930s. She was married to actor David Powell. == Selected filmography == * Badger's Green (1934) * To Be a Lady (1934) * The Girl in the Flat (1934) * The Plaything (1929) * Kitty (1929) * Paradise (1928) * Toni (1928) * King's Mate (1928) * Poppies of Flanders (1927) * The Rolling Road (1927) * The White Black Sheep (1926) * Just Suppose (1926) * The Beautiful City (1925) == References == Category:British women screenwriters Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Violet E. Powell
